Content.Text:
<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Your timing is wonderful. I was just thinking I
needed to speak with you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>...I think we should break up.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry it's so sudden. But I'm sure someone
as wonderful as you will quickly find someone
even better than I was.
Oh...okay. Goodbye.
No! Don't leave me!!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R>W-wait...!

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm sorry. I didn't mean what I said. I wasn't
being serious.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I told you before that I was writing a romance,
right?
<PAGE>
Well, I'd gotten stuck on the scene where the
main character's lover suddenly tries to break up
with her.
<PAGE>
So I thought acting out the scene with you
might give me some inspiration.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I was going to tell you I wasn't serious right
away...
<PAGE>
I didn't think you'd accept it that fast...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>...?
<PAGE>
Am I really someone you could just...give up on
like that, without any hesitation?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
True. I'm sorry. And I was the one who
suggested breaking up out of the blue.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know you were just trying to make it easier on
me by not dragging it out and making a fuss
over it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I do understand that, in my head...
<PAGE>
But it's times like this when a woman's heart
truly needs to hear that you want to stay
together.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hee hee. Though you wouldn't be the first man
to have trouble navigating the world of a
woman's heart...
<PAGE>
In fact, that's why my story is a tragic one,
where the romance is doomed to failure.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, this may have been a help to me after
all.
<PAGE>
Though let's try to prevent our relationship from
ending the way the story does.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh my goodness, I'm so sorry. I didn't expect
you'd deny it so sharply like that.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I told you before that I was writing a romance,
right?
<PAGE>
Well, I'd gotten stuck on the scene where the
main character's lover suddenly tries to break up
with her.
<PAGE>
So I thought acting out the scene with you
might give me some inspiration.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I didn't expect that I would shock you so terribly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>That was callous of me. I'm so sorry.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, please don't be so mad. Please? As an
apology, I'll do any one thing you ask me to do.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Hee hee... Though do try to keep it within
reason, please. Now then, <MYNAME>, what
would you like from me?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? A kiss? Are you sure that's all you want?
<PAGE>
We're a couple, you know. I'd happily give you a
kiss anytime, not just in this one situation.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
All right. I have to admit, I didn't see that request
coming from you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>After all, you're normally so much more polite
and reserved.
<PAGE>
I know you're probably trying to stay that way
because of our age difference...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But it does feel like hardly anything has changed
from when we were simply friends.
<PAGE>
Even though we're together now, I can't help but
start to wonder if you really are interested in me
at all.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Yes. You're right.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Your reaction a moment ago showed me very
clearly just how much you do care for me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Goodness! This has certainly gone in an
unexpected direction. It hasn't given me much
for my story, either.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Hee hee! But I wouldn't have it any other way.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now then, <MYNAME>. Close your eyes...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, Iris! Ms. Veronica just stopped by to drop
off a book she'd borrowed.
<PAGE>
She looked to be in a hurry, so I said I would
give it to you--

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm sorry. Am I interrupting?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Er, no. It's all right. You can put the book on my
desk. Thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_MISTEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>All right. Well then, <MYNAME>, I hope you
have a pleasant visit.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>...

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well, so much for the mood. What do you say
we try this again later?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>You did say you wanted to kiss me. I'd hardly
like it to be an off-hand, slap-dash affair.
<PAGE>
So will you forgive me for now? We'll do this
properly later, I promise.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you. By way of apology for the delay, why
don't we go out and have a cup of tea together?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
No being politely reserved now. Let me give you
the apology you deserve. And besides, it makes
a convenient excuse.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd been very insecure about a lot of things
before, you know.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But now that I've learned your true feelings for
me, I have to admit...I'm over the moon right
now.
<PAGE>
I'll take any excuse I can to spend even a little
more time with you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>Now don't make me say the rest out
loud...please?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee! Come on, let's go.
